title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 839.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 839.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

For the purposes of this Subchapter, except as the context
may otherwise require: (a) All words
and phrases which are defined by section
1.2
of the Compact shall have the
same meaning herein. (b) Words and
phrases which are defined by Part I of the Administrative Manual (Section 1-3)
shall have the same meaning for the purposes of this Subchapter. (c) Application
shall mean a
request for action by the commission in any written form, including without
limitation thereto, a letter, referral by any agency of a signatory party, or
an official form prescribed by the commission; provided that whenever an
official form of application has been duly required, an application shall not
be deemed to be pending before the commission until such time as such form, together with the information required thereby, has been completed and
filed. (d) Applicant
shall mean any sponsor or other person who has
submitted an application to the commission. (e) Material change
shall
mean a change to a project previously approved by the Commission that is
important in determining whether the project would substantially impair or
conflict with the Commission's comprehensive plan. (f) Sponsor
shall mean any
person authorized to initiate, construct or administer a
project. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
839.1

Amended

New

York State Register July 17, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 29, eff. 7/22/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
